alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sierra County through 300 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winston, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winston, Chloride and Chise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
